responses: All GA opportunities are competitive. Please review the current GA vacancies and policies at https://www.mnsu.edu/university-life/career-development-center/student-and-alumni-career-resources/jobs-and-internships/graduate-assistantship-opportunities/

patterns: Is Application fee waiver available
responses: We are currently not offering any application fee waiver
